languages.text: "Птичка одна моему хозяину напела, что на судне вашем крысы водятся. А мы — что ни на есть крысоловы, Ваше Торговшество. И готовы немедля избавить вас от сей беды. Всего-то требуется посадить Джай Хейдари в шлюпку да отправить прямиком по координатам, что мы вышлем. Хозяин мой давно за ней охотится, в долгу не останется".

traits.locale_text: "Птичка одна моему хозяину напела, что на судне вашем крысы водятся. А мы — что ни на есть крысоловы, Ваше Торговшество. И готовы немедля избавить вас от сей беды. Всего-то требуется посадить Джай Хейдари в шлюпку да отправить прямиком по координатам, что мы вышлем. Хозяин мой давно за ней охотится, в долгу не останется".

languages.text: "A little bird told my boss that you've got rats on your ship. Well, we're the best ratcatchers this side of the Maw, Your Tradership. And we're ready to take that problem right off your hands. All you have to do is put Jae Heydari on a pod and send her straight to the coordinates we'll give you. My boss has been after her a while, and he's generous to those who help him."
languages.original_text: "Птичка одна моему хозяину напела, что на судне вашем крысы водятся. А мы — что ни на есть крысоловы, Ваше Торговшество. И готовы немедля избавить вас от сей беды. Всего-то требуется посадить Джай Хейдари в шлюпку да отправить прямиком по координатам, что мы вышлем. Хозяин мой давно за ней охотится, в долгу не останется".

All you have to do is put Jae Heydari on a pod and send her straight to the coordinates we'll give you. My boss has been after her a while, and he's generous to those who help him."

languages.text: “如你所知，有只小小鸟告诉我的老板，说你的船上闹了鼠害。我们是‘巨口’这边最出色的捕鼠人，大人，我们可以帮助你解决这个问题。你只要把婕伊·海达利送上太空舱，把她送到我们发给你的坐标就好了。我的老板一直在找她，对那些愿意帮他的人，他一向非常慷慨。”
languages.original_text: "A little bird told my boss that you've got rats on your ship. Well, we're the best ratcatchers this side of the Maw, Your Tradership. And we're ready to take that problem right off your hands. All you have to do is put Jae Heydari on a pod and send her straight to the coordinates we'll give you. My boss has been after her a while, and he's generous to those who help him."

traits.locale_text: “如你所知，有只小小鸟告诉我的老板，说你的船上闹了鼠害。我们是‘巨口’这边最出色的捕鼠人，大人，我们可以帮助你解决这个问题。你只要把婕伊·海达利送上太空舱，把她送到我们发给你的坐标就好了。我的老板一直在找她，对那些愿意帮他的人，他一向非常慷慨。”

languages.text: «Un pajarito ha informado a mi jefe de que tiene ratas a bordo. Y somos los mejores desratizadores a este lado de las Fauces, su Comercianteza. Estamos dispuestos a quitarle ese problema de las manos. Solo tiene que mandar a Jae Heydari en una cápsula a las coordenadas que le daremos. Mi jefe lleva un tiempo buscándola y es generoso con quienes le ayudan».
languages.original_text: "A little bird told my boss that you've got rats on your ship. Well, we're the best ratcatchers this side of the Maw, Your Tradership. And we're ready to take that problem right off your hands. All you have to do is put Jae Heydari on a pod and send her straight to the coordinates we'll give you. My boss has been after her a while, and he's generous to those who help him."

traits.locale_text: «Un pajarito ha informado a mi jefe de que tiene ratas a bordo. Y somos los mejores desratizadores a este lado de las Fauces, su Comercianteza. Estamos dispuestos a quitarle ese problema de las manos. Solo tiene que mandar a Jae Heydari en una cápsula a las coordenadas que le daremos. Mi jefe lleva un tiempo buscándola y es generoso con quienes le ayudan».

languages.text: 「ボスが小鳥から聞いたんだ。あんたの船にネズミがいるってな。俺たちはマウのこちら側じゃ一番のネズミ捕りだぜ、貿易商殿。その問題、こっちで引き受けてやる準備はできてる。ただ、ジェイ・ヘイダリをポッドに詰めて、指定する座標に送ってくれりゃいい。ボスはあの女をずっと追っててな。協力してくれるなら、気前よく報いてくれるさ」
languages.original_text: "A little bird told my boss that you've got rats on your ship. Well, we're the best ratcatchers this side of the Maw, Your Tradership. And we're ready to take that problem right off your hands. All you have to do is put Jae Heydari on a pod and send her straight to the coordinates we'll give you. My boss has been after her a while, and he's generous to those who help him."

traits.locale_text: 「ボスが小鳥から聞いたんだ。あんたの船にネズミがいるってな。俺たちはマウのこちら側じゃ一番のネズミ捕りだぜ、貿易商殿。その問題、こっちで引き受けてやる準備はできてる。ただ、ジェイ・ヘイダリをポッドに詰めて、指定する座標に送ってくれりゃいい。ボスはあの女をずっと追っててな。協力してくれるなら、気前よく報いてくれるさ」

languages.text: « Un petit oiseau a signalé à mon patron que vous aviez des rats sur votre vaisseau, vous voyez. Et il se trouve qu'on est les meilleurs dératiseurs de ce côté-ci de la Gueule, Votre Libre-Marchanditude, alors on serait disposés à vous débarrasser de votre problème. Pour ça, il vous suffit de mettre Jae Heydari dans une capsule et de l'expédier aux coordonnées qu'on va vous donner. Ça fait un bail que mon patron la cherche et il est généreux quand on lui file un coup de main. »
languages.original_text: "A little bird told my boss that you've got rats on your ship. Well, we're the best ratcatchers this side of the Maw, Your Tradership. And we're ready to take that problem right off your hands. All you have to do is put Jae Heydari on a pod and send her straight to the coordinates we'll give you. My boss has been after her a while, and he's generous to those who help him."

traits.locale_text: « Un petit oiseau a signalé à mon patron que vous aviez des rats sur votre vaisseau, vous voyez. Et il se trouve qu'on est les meilleurs dératiseurs de ce côté-ci de la Gueule, Votre Libre-Marchanditude, alors on serait disposés à vous débarrasser de votre problème. Pour ça, il vous suffit de mettre Jae Heydari dans une capsule et de l'expédier aux coordonnées qu'on va vous donner. Ça fait un bail que mon patron la cherche et il est généreux quand on lui file un coup de main. »

languages.text: "Ein Vögelchen hat meinem Boss gezwitschert, dass Ihr Ratten auf Eurem Schiff habt. Nun, wir sind die besten Rattenfänger diesseits des Schlunds, Eure Händlerschaft. Und wir sind bereit, Euer Problem umgehend für Euch zu lösen. Ihr müsst lediglich Jae Heydari in eine Kapsel setzen und direkt zu den Koordinaten schicken, die wir Euch geben. Mein Boss ist schon eine Weile hinter ihr her, und er ist großzügig zu allen, die ihm helfen."
languages.original_text: "A little bird told my boss that you've got rats on your ship. Well, we're the best ratcatchers this side of the Maw, Your Tradership. And we're ready to take that problem right off your hands. All you have to do is put Jae Heydari on a pod and send her straight to the coordinates we'll give you. My boss has been after her a while, and he's generous to those who help him."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Vögelchen hat meinem Boss gezwitschert, dass Ihr Ratten auf Eurem Schiff habt. Nun, wir sind die besten Rattenfänger diesseits des Schlunds, Eure Händlerschaft. Und wir sind bereit, Euer Problem umgehend für Euch zu lösen. Ihr müsst lediglich Jae Heydari in eine Kapsel setzen und direkt zu den Koordinaten schicken, die wir Euch geben. Mein Boss ist schon eine Weile hinter ihr her, und er ist großzügig zu allen, die ihm helfen."

languages.text: "Minik bir kuşun patronuma dediğine göre geminizde köstebek sıkıntınız varmış. Biz de Ağız'ın bu yanındaki en iyi köstebek avcılarıyız. Yani Tacir Hazretleri, şu sıkıntınızı bir çırpıda halledebiliriz. Tek yapmanız gereken, Jae Heydari'yi bir mekiğe bindirip size vereceğimiz koordinatlara göndermek. Patronum bir süredir onun peşinde, yardımınızı karşılıksız bırakmaz."
languages.original_text: "A little bird told my boss that you've got rats on your ship. Well, we're the best ratcatchers this side of the Maw, Your Tradership. And we're ready to take that problem right off your hands. All you have to do is put Jae Heydari on a pod and send her straight to the coordinates we'll give you. My boss has been after her a while, and he's generous to those who help him."
